trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Seaside Heights
There were no other sightings in Seaside Heights on or around November 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outide to take my dogs for a walk I often look up at the sky, on this occassion I observed an object hovereing I looked at object thrue my telescope and observed it changing colors from green to red to white, then moving up and right, then dissappearing, this same object was seen on previous nights by myself and my wife. On previous sunday at about 7:30 PM I was again walking my dog and observed what I thought was a star but was just above tree top level we examined this for a while then when we came back it was gone this object was very bright in color.
Summary: Object sited N/E over bay, hovering and changing colors,moving.
